General.Name: Godawari Power And Ispat limited
General.Description: Godawari Power & Ispat Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells iron and steel products primarily in India. The company offers iron ore pellets, sponge iron, iron and steel billets, MS rounds, steel wires, hard black wires, wire rods, silico manganese, and ferro alloys. It is also involved in the operation of 98 MW of captive power generation capacity, including 42MW waste heat recovery, 11 MW thermal coal based, and 20 MW bio-mass power; and 70 MWP captive solar PV power plant. The company was formerly known as Ispat Godawari Ltd. Godawari Power & Ispat Limited was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Raipur, India.
